entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cache contains wrong information about COM interop after changes in the COM interfaces #73191
  • Adjust `CompoundUseSiteInfo<TAssemblySymbol>.MergeAndClear` for discarding diagnostic bag #73188
    Backlog

Closed

  • IDE0053 has a non-deterministic title in SARIF logs #73070
    17.11
  • Confusing warning and unintuitive behavior of `is` operator applied to an instance of a `ref struct` #73193
  • How to have deterministic build inside git? #73161
  • Debug Assertion fails for RefSafetyAnalysis #72873
    17.11
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34822.156 #73187

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache diagnostics produced during workspace pull, to avoid unnecessary computations #73202
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache diagnostics produced during workspace pull, to avoid unnecessary computations #73201
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Ensure we always cache diag results. #73199
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update Semantic Search to work when ServiceHub is disabled #73196
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lower drop retention from 10 years to 3 months #73190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add more information in checksums #73200
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove specialized list pool. #73192
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove parameter which was always passed the same value #73198
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Address unstable ordering in AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #73189
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Add Semantic Search feature flag to pkgdef #73197
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic function not used in any product code #73194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix certain solution asserts. #73195
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use a small subset of VS JSON converters for VS Code #73180
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove mention of removed option `bootstrapConfig` from docs #73174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Visit binary operators in ref safety analysis #73081
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup our temp-storage (memory mapped file) code. #73115
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove reflection code for C# code mapper #73186
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix LSP File watching so it correctly reports the baseUri if there's a trailing slash #73203
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement MEF based pull diagnostics #73073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Check UI context before trying to initialize cohosting #73172
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update referenced MSBuild to 17.3.4 #73113
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73111
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Exclude assemblies shared by .NET ServiceHub host #73087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Ensure source paths are comparable with editorconfig directory paths #73100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
